title: [W]Claimant average weekly work hours
avgWeeklyHrsLabel: [W]Average weekly work hours provided on ET1
p1: [W]It may help the tribunal if you can provide these detail. You will not be penalised for not providing it.

et3ResponseClaimantWeeklyHours.label: [W]Are the claimant’s average weekly work hours correct?

et3ResponseClaimantCorrectHours.label: [W]What are the claimant’s correct average weekly work hours? (optional)
et3ResponseClaimantCorrectHours.hint: [W]Enter the claimant’s average hours worked each week in digits.

et3ResponseClaimantCorrectHours.invalid: [W]The average weekly work hours’ entered must be less than 168 hours
et3ResponseClaimantCorrectHours.exceeded: [W]The average weekly work hours’ entered must be less than 168 hours
